Effect: Hydra Regeneration.name: Effect: Hydra Regeneration
Effect: Hydra Regeneration.description:
The hydra has regeneration equal to 3 x the number of heads it has.

Set the level of this effect to the number of heads remaining.

Hymn of Healing +.name: Hymn of Healing +
Hymn of Healing +.description:
Your divine singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm. The target gains fast healing 2.

When you Cast this Spell and each time you Sustain the Spell, the target gains 2 temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e-persistent-damage.pf2e-persistent-damage-effects.7MfflFvjK1k87fMg]{Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing}

Heightened (+1) The fast healing and temporary Hit Points
each increase by 2.

Spell Effect: Hymn of Healing.description:
